T02D2965:45b-0: @45b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2965:45b-1: gang las kyang rnam par rgyal bar 'dod pa'i don
T02D2965:45b-2: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang
T02D2965:45b-3: yid dang mthun par manda la dang me tog dang
T02D2965:45b-4: mchod pa'i yod byad rdzogs par byas te /
T02D2965:45b-5: khrus la sogs pa bya ba'i rim pa rnams byas la /
T02D2965:45b-6: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo padma 'khyil pa sku
T02D2965:45b-7: mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa be con
T02D2965:45b-8: dang sdigs mdzub tsan gyi phyag rgya can du rnam
T02D2965:45b-9: pa blta ste / sngags 'di yid kyis brgyan rtsa
T02D2965:45b-10: brgyad brjod na 'jig rten pa'i mna' las rnam par
T02D2965:45b-12: aom su badzr'a ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes par nges par 'grub bo //
